data.event: It is named for the "beautiful hill" on which St. Vital Church, built in 1919, is located within the centre of the town.
The name was selected in 1895 as part of a petition for a post office.
The population of the Town of Beaumont according to its 2015 municipal census is 16,768, a 7000590000000000000â™ 5.9% change from its 2014 municipal census population of 15,828.
